presentation.summary: I'm a Senior full-stack developer with 10+ years of professional experience working with frontend and backend infrastructures. I started as a backend developer, and got in love with the frontend, the designs, animations and logic involved. I’m always looking to learn new technologies, tools and new challenges.
presentation.career_focus: Despite starting as a backend dev, I’m looking to keep working with frontend technologies, in a full-stack or frontend position, as a developer or tech leader, but always close to the code.

general_proficiency: Jest / Enzyme / React Testing Library / xUnit / MSTest

experience.title: Senior Frontend Developer
responsibilities: Developing features for the main web app, fully responsive and pixel perfect.
Creating base components to be used across app and teams.
Developing new UI interfaces, creating an AI chat and tools to enable users create content dynamically.

experience.title: Senior Frontend Developer
responsibilities: Working with agile methodology on the first release of an iOS app.
Developing precise responsive designs and animations with CSS from Figma.
Developing the frontend logic, new features, proposing and implementing design and logic solutions.
Creating and maintaining unit tests and e2e tests across the app.
Using Ionic as a UI framework and Capacitor to build the app for devices and interact with the peripherals.
Creating custom packages with bit.cloud to reuse components for the Web part.

experience.title: Senior Frontend Developer / CTL
responsibilities: Part of a team dedicated to SEO improvements.
Developing on the frontend, creating new components, as well as fixing or changing existing ones, with a responsive design.
Migrating Redux in favor of GraphQL and implementing Next.js.
Creating and maintaining unit tests across the app.
Adding and updating schema markups, and applying A/B testing and other changes proposed by SEO experts.
Company Team Leader (CTL) of 5 people, tracking hours, objectives, and team mood with company and client.
Tech interviewer for new frontend positions.

experience.title: Senior Fronnd Developer / Tech Lead
responsibilities: Developing widgets over a custom platform, simultaneously with other teams.
Leading the UI re-engineering of multiple trading applications.
Working on architecture design and implementation.
Creating a shared UI components library.
Maintaining high unit-test coverage.
Developing high-performance real-time applications with WebSocket.
Started as a Senior Developer and ended up being a mentor to juniors, interns, and backend developers for the frontend.

experience.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Developing frontend and backend infrastructures.
Using Agile methodologies.
Establishing sustained contact with clients to gather requirements and specifications.

experience.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Working from end to end, from database tables up to the frontend.
Backend development, database design, and API Rest services.
Frontend development, logic and styling.
Developing reports with JasperReports.

experience.title: Semi-Sr Frontend Developer
responsibilities: Started on a team project for a web and mobile application as a frontend dev.
Working with scrum, on new features and improvements over the web and mobile app, mounted with Apache Cordova.
Developed an android customized keyboard in Thai.
Moved to manage several frontend development projects at the same time as a one-man team.
Developing POC applications to sell them to clients, using C3 and D3 charts.
Managing projects to be integrated with services and backend.
Keeping communication with clients to develop the POC, create new functionalities, make improvements.

experience.title: Semi-Sr Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Develop web applications with .Net.
Backend with MVC and frontend using CSS, JavaScript and Bootstrap.
In charge of technical documentation and communication with the client.

experience.title: Jr Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Develop SharePoint 2013 webparts with C#.NET.
Develop web and desktop applications with C#.NET.
Develop desktop Java applications.
Database development with Oracle and MySQL.
